#summary The navigator.browserLanguage property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property,from-microsoft

== Values ==

The `navigator.browserLanguage` property returns a string.
  * [BrowserFamilyMSIE Internet Explorer] returns your browser language and country code.  Example: `"en-us"`
  * [BrowserFamilyOpera Opera] returns your browser language.  Example: `"en"`

This property is read-only.
